Operation result: Success. Reason: The POST requests to /mos/share/v1/devices consistently returned HTTP 200 status codes with "success":true in the payload. This unanimous agreement across all reports confirms the plug sharing configuration was successfully processed both locally and by the cloud server, with no conflicting error indicators observed.

Operation result: Failed. Reason: All POST requests to /mos/share/v1/devices showed "success":false in the payload, accompanied by masked HTTP error codes. The consensus suggests authorization failures due to permission conflicts, invalid recipient configurations, or parameter mismatches, potentially compounded by an inconsistent device sharing state.
